text:
apr_file_write_full on win32, does not consider the timeout value set by 
apr_file_pipe_timeout_set.  The caller may end up waiting forever when the 
caller did not intend this behavior.
creator: eholyat@olf.com

text:
Created attachment 12160
timeout will now be considered when writing to pipe
creator: eholyat@olf.com

text: This is a windows NT bug.
creator: eholyat@olf.com

text:
Created attachment 12164
fixes timeout for win32 pipes
